issue.title: [Rust] [Integration Testing] Read i64 from json files as strings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9274](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9274). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The integration files were recently changed to use strings for 64-bit numbers, and this caused failures for the relevant Rust Arrow IPC test cases. This Jira is for the work to fix that.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9274?focusedCommentId=17148635) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7588
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7588>
